DOC.brief_summary: The investigator intends to review retrospective de-identified data of patients who have had Laparoscopic Radical Cystectomies by the Department of Urology at UCIMC.
DOC.brief_title: Chart Review of Laparoscopic Radical Cystectomy
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator fills out a standardized form for each patient undergoing a laparoscopic radical cystectomy.
DOC.criteria: Review information on patients who had laparoscopic Radical cystectomy at UCIMC
